description:
Located in Fairview Heights, Illinois, the law office of Brown & Crouppen is one of seven we have in the Greater St. Louis metro region, providing convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and support possible to individuals and families seeking the maximum amount of compensation for the injuries and losses they sustained as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Since we first opened our doors in 1979 from our main law office in St. Louis, Missouri, we have achieved notable success fighting on behalf of the injured and disabled, and we have recovered more than $850 million for our plaintiff clients for their personal injury and wrongful death claims, medical malpractice claims, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation claims, and other similar disputes. Recognized for our success, Missouri Lawyers Weekly voted us as the "Winningest Plaintiff Law Firm," and we have received numerous positive reviews from our clients.

Backed by our more than 50 years of combined legal experience, we possess the skills and resources necessary to help you achieve the results you expect, and although we cannot guarantee a specific outcome, we can promise to do all we can to assert your rights, protect your entitlements and fight to obtain the most favorable outcome possible.

If you suffered an injury or lost a loved one and you are struggling to make ends meet now that you can no longer work, you can contact Brown & Crouppen by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. If we don't win your case, you will owe us nothing, and we are ready to do all we can to help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family.
